name: The Journey Home (itch) (JJ & Friends!)
description:
A short story about being lost at sea and making a friend. It is interactive fiction, but I added a mini-game for the jam wildcard. This was submitted to Godot Wild Jam #41. The theme was "Ocean". I chose the fishing mini-game wildcard.

  • Time to finish: 10 minutes
  • Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to interact. You may need to click inside the game window if the controls are not working.
  • Audio: Music is from Pixabay, "Waves and Tears" by JuliusH and "Simple Piano Melody" by ZakharValaha. Sound effects are from Pixabay and mixkit.co. If the audio does not play, you might need to use Chrome or Firefox.
  • Graphics: I drew everything myself! The font is PT Sans (Open Font License)
  • Accessibility features: Two movement options (left- and right-handed), simple controls, high-contrast colors in fishing game, high-contrast text, large font size
  • Ages: Everyone

To learn more about the main character, you can play JJ, a longer game also made with Godot Engine!
